attributes.action: ban the Islamic extremist group Hizb ut Tahir from operating in the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair promised after the 7/7 bombings to ban Hizb ut Tahir. The organisation wishes to establish an Islamic caliphate across Britain and preaches intolerance to  people of other faiths. It openly opposes Democracy, and says that Islam is in conflict with Israelis.
